job.title: DevOps Engineer

(Especially Azure +Terraform)â¢	Should have worked on setting up & troubleshooting Kubernetes Clusters in Production ready environmentâ¢	Help teams in migration from monolithic application to Micro services using containerization solutions (Docker, Kubernetes)â¢	Worked on onboarding Micro services (Middleware/UI) components using DevOps technique & look for improvementsâ¢	Prior experience in automating CI/CD process, platform services using open source toolsjerrin@smartitframe.com
